search_queries.name: scrubbing_centers_mitigation
search_queries.query: abs:("scrubbing center" OR "traffic filtering" OR "DDoS mitigation") AND (infrastructure OR architecture OR distributed)

search_queries.name: edge_cdn_anycast
search_queries.query: abs:("edge computing" OR CDN OR anycast) AND (DDoS OR "network security" OR defense)
search_queries.description: Edge computing, CDN, and anycast routing

search_queries.name: layered_defense
search_queries.query: abs:("layered defense" OR "defense in depth") AND ("network security" OR DDoS)

search_queries.name: cloud_native_protection
search_queries.query: abs:("cloud native" OR microservices OR serverless) AND ("DDoS protection" OR security OR resilience)

search_queries.name: hybrid_defense
search_queries.query: abs:("hybrid defense" OR "multi-cloud" OR federated) AND (security OR DDoS OR infrastructure)

search_queries.name: capacity_planning
search_queries.query: abs:(capacity OR scaling OR "multi-Tbps") AND (DDoS OR mitigation OR defense)

search_queries.name: traffic_engineering
search_queries.query: abs:("traffic engineering" OR "load balancing" OR routing) AND (DDoS OR attack OR mitigation)

search_queries.name: distributed_systems_security
search_queries.query: abs:("distributed systems" OR "distributed architecture") AND (DDoS OR "attack mitigation" OR resilience)
